summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 60th Street from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest, et al, by resurfacing, etc., all in accordance with Resolution No. 3770 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
